Apple_Valley.WGVX:
WGVX, WRXP and WWWM-FM are three separate radio stations that make up a trimulcast serving the Minneapolis-St. Paul radio market. The three stations are owned by Cumulus Media, along with sister stations KQRS-FM and KXXR. The three stations broadcast a classic hip hop radio format, with the moniker "105 The Vibe."
The studios and offices are in Southeast Minneapolis in the Como district.
